direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from a collection, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods modify the collection by either removing or retaining elements based on a condition.
Both methods allow for conditional removal of elements, though removeIf uses a predicate for filtering.
Both methods involve clearing elements from a collection, though clear removes all elements unconditionally.
Both methods involve modifying elements, though removeAttr specifically targets attributes.
Both methods involve removing elements from the DOM, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods involve clearing elements, though empty removes child nodes instead of the elements themselves.
Both methods modify the DOM structure, though unwrap specifically moves child nodes up into their parents.
